alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Greene; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones, southwestern Greene, southwestern Lenoir, northwestern Onslow and northeastern Duplin Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut Creek, or near La Grange, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinston, La Grange, Phillips Crossroads, Kornegay, Richlands, Deep Run, Comfort, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Albertson, Pink Hill, Sandy Bottom and Hargetts Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Greene; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir
